divs: Sighting Detailsin sept 06 myself my wife and son ware in our pool we saw two ojects with lights,one of the ojects came closeer we had a abovegound pool a ladder 5 feet hi' so i stood on the ladder to see better aspaceship came in close 100feet above it had a black botom slver top ,it came closeer i became afraid .and got off the ladder it went away ,backed up and lift .i think they were curious because i am black and my wife is white our son is mixed
